comment.author: 40797463@N06
comment._content: At Constantia, New York. The Depot is out of sight to the left of the image. This's originally a New York & Oswego Midland (predecessor to the NYO&W) built tank. The enclosed tanks (system wide) were all replaced during the several capital improvements programs between the 1890's and ca. 1912-1914.

comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Science, Technology, History, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
